I don't disagree with that statement. I think some can and do travel.

I am=
 not your normal ghost hunter. I am skeptical, but I keep an open mind to a=
ny possibility. Until everything has been proven once and for all, anything=
 is possible.

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Frank Sumption 
  To=
: group 
  Sent: Thursday, April 02, 2009 4:02 PM
  Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] =
Hi All


  Thanks. I can be a bit critical of ghost hunters, but htat's cuz=
 I think ghosts travel and I do all my recordings at home.
   
   F-S
   

=

--------------------------------------------------------------------------=

  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
  From: april@abercrombieghostresearch.c=
om
  Date: Thu, 2 Apr 2009 15:52:53 -0600
  Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Hi All

  Awesome!! Nice to meet you :)

    ----- Original Message ----- 
    Fro=
m: Frank Sumption 
    To: group 
    Sent: Thursday, April 02, 2009 3:51 P=
M
    Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Hi All


    There's two Franks, I'm Frank-S a=
nd I make the boxes.

    To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
    From: apr=
il@...
    Date: Thu, 2 Apr 2009 15:48:40 -0600

  Subject: [EVP-ITC] Hi All


    New here. Thanks for the approval.

    F=
rank...are you the same Frank that makes the Frank's Boxes?

    April
